item.title: Right to classify
item.description: If I sign myself Jean-Paul Sartre it is not the same thing as if I sign myself Jean-Paul Sartre, Nobel Prizewinner. When I joined the company I currently work at I was a privacy noob. Little did I know that Privacy wars will be the next big thing in the Big Tech. There is a prevailing view that any kind of Data is a kind of commodity.
